# Table of Contents

---

- [**Getting Started**](/started#getting-started)
  - [Introduction](/started#introduction)
    - [What Xuxi can do](/started#what-xuxi-can-do)
    - [How Can Xuxi Help You](/started#how-can-xuxi-help-you)
  - [Why Use Xuxi](/started#why-use-xuxi)
    - [Versatile & Dynamic](/started#-versatile-dynamic)
    - [Optimized & Efficient](/started#-optimized-efficient)
    - [Universal Compatibility](/started#-universal-compatibility)
    - [Simple API, Powerful Features](/started#-simple-api-powerful-features)
  - [Core Features](/started#core-features)
    - [Xuxi Built for Modern Development](/started#xuxi-built-for-modern-development)
- [**Installation**](/installation#installation)
  - [Requirements](/installation#requirements)
    - [TypeScript Configuration](/installation#typescript-configuration)
  - [Install via Package Managers](/installation#install-via-package-managers)
  - [Using a CDN](/installation#using-a-cdn)
    - [UMD (Global Script)](/installation#umd-global-script)
    - [ESM (Module Import)](/installation#esm-module-import)
- [**ocx**](/ocx#ocx)
  - [Syntax](/ocx#syntax)
  - [How ocx works](/ocx#how-ocx-works)
  - [Example Usage](/ocx#example-usage)
    - [Merging Objects](/ocx#merging-objects)
  - [Real-World Examples](/ocx#real-world-examples)
    - [Dynamic API Response Combination](/ocx#dynamic-api-response-combination)
    - [Complex API Response Combination with additional data](/ocx#complex-api-response-combination-with-additional-data)
    - [Complex Merging of Nested and Dynamic Data](/ocx#complex-merging-of-nested-and-dynamic-data)
    - [Serialization Example](/ocx#serialization-example)
      - [1. API Response Cleaning & Normalization](/ocx#1-api-response-cleaning-normalization)
      - [2. Query Parameter Serialization](/ocx#2-query-parameter-serialization)
      - [3. Object Serialization for Caching](/ocx#3-object-serialization-for-caching)
    - [Complex Serialization Example](/ocx#complex-serialization-example)
  - [Handling Symbol Keys in ocx](/ocx#handling-symbol-keys-in-ocx)
    - [Why Use Symbol](/ocx#why-use-symbol)
    - [Example Usage with Symbol](/ocx#example-usage-with-symbol)
      - [1. Symbol as Object Keys](/ocx#1-symbol-as-object-keys)
      - [2. Merging Objects with Symbol](/ocx#2-merging-objects-with-symbol)
      - [3. Deep Merging with Symbol](/ocx#3-deep-merging-with-symbol)
      - [4. Symbol in Nested Objects](/ocx#4-symbol-in-nested-objects)
      - [5. Symbol in Node.js (util.inspect.custom)](/ocx#5-symbol-in-nodejs-utilinspectcustom)
  - [Advantages](/ocx#advantages)
- [**cnx**](/cnx#cnx)
  - [Syntax](/cnx#syntax)
  - [How cnx works](/cnx#how-cnx-works)
  - [Example Usage](/cnx#example-usage)
    - [Basic Merging](/cnx#basic-merging)
    - [Complex Merging](/cnx#complex-merging)
    - [Ignored Falsy](/cnx#ignored-falsy)
  - [Advantages](/cnx#advantages)
  - [Merge class tailwind-merge](/cnx#merge-class-tailwind-merge)
  - [IntelliSense](/cnx#intellisense)
- [**cvx**](/cvx#cvx)
  - [Syntax](/cvx#syntax)
  - [How cvx works](/cvx#how-cvx-works)
  - [Example Usage](/cvx#example-usage)
  - [Advantages](/cvx#advantages)
  - [IntelliSense](/cvx#intellisense)
    - [rem dan em](/converter#rem-dan-em)
      - [Syntax](/converter#syntax)
      - [Parameters](/converter#parameters)
      - [Details](/converter#details)
      - [Example of Usage](/converter#example-of-usage)
    - [px](/converter#px)
      - [Syntax](/converter#syntax)
      - [Parameters](/converter#parameters)
      - [Example of Usage](/converter#example-of-usage)
    - [createConverter](/converter#createconverter)
      - [Syntax](/converter#syntax)
      - [Parameters](/converter#parameters)
      - [Example of Usage](/converter#example-of-usage)
    - [Advantages and Optimizations](/converter#advantages-and-optimizations)
- [**clean**](/clean#clean)
  - [Syntax](/clean#syntax)
    - [How clean Works](/clean#how-clean-works)
  - [Example Usage](/clean#example-usage)
    - [Removing Falsy Values from an Object](/clean#removing-falsy-values-from-an-object)
    - [Removing Falsy Values from Arrays](/clean#removing-falsy-values-from-arrays)
    - [Preserving Certain Falsy Values](/clean#preserving-certain-falsy-values)
    - [Cleaning Nested Objects](/clean#cleaning-nested-objects)
    - [Cleaning Arrays](/clean#cleaning-arrays)
    - [Excluding Specific Values](/clean#excluding-specific-values)
  - [Advantages](/clean#advantages)
- [**Types**](/types#types)
  - [cvxVariants](/types#cvxvariants)
    - [Syntax](/types#syntax)
  - [InferType](/types#infertype)
    - [Syntax](/types#syntax)
    - [How InferType Works](/types#how-infertype-works)
    - [Example Usage](/types#example-usage)
    - [When to Use InferType](/types#when-to-use-infertype)
- [**Meta**](/meta#meta)
  - [Documentation](/meta#documentation)
  - [Repository](/meta#repository)
  - [Installation](/meta#installation)
  - [Bundles](/meta#bundles)
  - [Score and Test](/meta#score-and-test)
- [**Exported**](/exported#exported)
  - [Using Named and Default Exports Together](/exported#using-named-and-default-exports-together)
  - [For ES Modules Users](/exported#for-es-modules-users)
  - [For CommonJS Users](/exported#for-commonjs-users)
  - [How We Recommend Using This Library](/exported#how-we-recommend-using-this-library)
  - [Targeting ES2020](/exported#targeting-es2020)
- [**License**](/license#license)
- [**CHANGELOG**](/changelog#changelog)
  - [v1.0.0](/changelog#100---2025-05-05)
    - [Enhancements](/changelog#enhancements)
    - [Documentation](/changelog#documentation)
    - [Summary](/changelog#summary)
    - [Changed](/changelog#changed)
      - [Refactored](/changelog#refactored)
    - [Removed](/changelog#removed)
  - [v0.1.0](/changelog#010---2025-05-04)
    - [Added](/changelog#added)
    - [Changed](/changelog#changed)
    - [Removed](/changelog#removed)
  - [v0.0.1](/changelog#001---2025-01-25)
    - [Added](/changelog#added)
    - [Changed](/changelog#changed)
    - [Fixed](/changelog#fixed)
  - [v0.0.0](/changelog#000---2025-01-23)
    - [Added](/changelog#added)
    - [Changed](/changelog#changed)
- [**Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct**](/coc#contributor-covenant-code-of-conduct)
  - [Our Pledge](/coc#our-pledge)
  - [Our Standards](/coc#our-standards)
  - [Scope](/coc#scope)
  - [Enforcement](/coc#enforcement)
  - [Enforcement Guidelines](/coc#enforcement-guidelines)
    - [1. Correction](/coc#1-correction)
    - [2. Warning](/coc#2-warning)
    - [3. Temporary Ban](/coc#3-temporary-ban)
    - [4. Permanent Ban](/coc#4-permanent-ban)
  - [Attribution](/coc#attribution)
  - [Our Vision](/coc#our-vision)
- [**Links**](/links#links)
  - [Documentation](/links#documentation)
  - [Repository](/links#repository)
  - [Installation](/links#installation)
  - [Bundles](/links#bundles)
  - [Score and Test](/links#score-and-test)
